Detailed Description

Represent the bar used in a text editor and contains line number. The bar must be associate with the QTextEdit to be used. When we refresh the QTextEdit (i.e. scroll) the number bar must be repain. The number bar use the block of the QTextEdit. He considere that one block is equal to one line. It's rigth in plain text document, but not in rich edit document.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

NumberBar::NumberBar ( QWidget *  parent  ) 

Create a bar, with a parent widget and a direction. the direction is Vertical by default, and is the only current value.

Member Function Documentation

void NumberBar::setTextEdit ( TextEditor *  edit  ) 

Define the text edit used with the number bar. The Text Edit will be used to count the number block and known where ths start of the document is show.

Parameters:

void NumberBar::paintEvent ( QPaintEvent *  ev  )  [virtual]

Redfine the paint event of the number bar. The paint event write the line number in the number bar.

Redefine the mouse event of the number bar. The mouse event show a popup to toggled a Bookmark.
